item.title: 2015 Honda Vezel - Unmatched Efficiency & Style!
item.description:
Experience the perfect blend of performance, safety, and innovation with the Honda Vezel!

Key Features

  • Engine: 1.5L Hybrid with up to 137 HP
  • Fuel Efficiency: Up to 30 km/l (highway)
  • Safety: 5-star safety rating
  • Cargo Space: Expandable to 1,156 liters

Vehicle Details

Feature Specification
Year 2015
Make Honda
Model Vezel
Mileage 150,807 km
Condition Used
Transmission Automatic
Fuel Type Hybrid
Price $115,000 TTD

Description

Introducing the sleek and stylish 2015 Honda Vezel! This reliable SUV boasts a powerful 1.5L engine with up to 137 HP in hybrid mode, ensuring an exhilarating driving experience. Enjoy exceptional fuel efficiency of up to 30 km/l on the highway, making it perfect for both your daily commute and weekend getaways.

item.title: Home Care Taker Needed
item.description:
Position Overview

Seeking a reliable and experienced home care taker for regular house maintenance in Oropuche. The ideal candidate should be trustworthy, detail-oriented, and able to work independently.

Key Responsibilities

Cleaning Tasks

  • General dusting and sweeping of all rooms
  • Mopping of all floor surfaces
  • Bathroom cleaning and sanitization
  • Kitchen cleaning including countertops and appliances
  • Window cleaning
  • Vacuuming carpets and rugs (if applicable)
  • Tidying and organizing living spaces

Additional Tasks

  • Laundry assistance if required
  • Basic organization of household items
  • Waste removal and bin management
  • Light ironing if needed

Schedule

  • Frequency: 1-2 times per week
  • Schedule to be discussed and arranged
  • Flexible timing available

Requirements

  • Experience in home cleaning and maintenance
  • Attention to detail
  • Reliable and punctual
  • References preferred

Location

Oropuche area

item.title: Responsible Babysitter Needed - Oropuche Area
item.description:
Position Overview

Seeking a responsible and experienced babysitter for a 4-month-old baby in the Oropuche area. The position requires dedication, reliability, and genuine care for infant development.

Key Responsibilities

Childcare Duties

  • Infant feeding and meal preparation
  • Diaper changing and hygiene maintenance
  • Baby bathing and grooming
  • Ensuring baby’s safety and well-being at all times

Additional Tasks

  • Bottle washing and sterilization
  • Baby-related laundry
  • Minor housework associated with baby care
  • Maintaining a clean and safe environment

Requirements

  • 1-2 years minimum childcare experience
  • Must be located in or near Oropuche area
  • Reliable and punctual
  • Strong references preferred

Schedule

  • Hours: 7 AM - 4 PM
  • Schedule is negotiable
  • Long-term position

Contact Information

For more details or to apply, please call: 475-5143

item.title: 2015 Mazda 3 Core
item.description:
Skyactiv Technology.

Performance meets Luxury.

This vehicle is in excellent condition and is accident-free. It features a powerful and efficient Skyactiv engine, delivering an exhilarating driving experience while maintaining impressive fuel economy. The luxurious interior provides a comfortable and stylish ride, equipped with advanced technology and safety features.

Key Features

  • Skyactiv Technology for optimal performance
  • Excellent condition
  • Accident-free history
  • Advanced safety features
  • Luxurious interior
  • Fuel efficient
  • Automatic transmission

Contact

For more information or to schedule a viewing, please call: 868-475-5143
